caption.p: Flowchart of pandemic (H1N1) 2009 case-patients and household contacts, including contacts with respiratory symptoms, contacts from whom swab specimens were collected, and PCR result, United Kingdom, 2009. *Symptom onset date <2 weeks after index case-patient symptom onset; †46 persons had symptom onset date >2 weeks after index case-patient and 4 had missing symptom onset date; ‡5 persons had swabs taken >2 weeks after index case-patient symptom onset, and 3 had positive test results; §2 persons (neither positive) had swabs taken >2 weeks after index case-patient symptom onset; ¶3 persons (none positive) had swabs taken >2 weeks after index case-patient symptom onset.
